name: Penguin Patrol
text: You can discard this card; add 1 "Penguin Paradise" from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect) You can target 1 face-down monster you control; change it to face-up Defense Position and if it is a "Penguin" monster, immediately after this effect resolves, Special Summon 1 "Nopenguin" from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Penguin Patrol" once per turn.
